description:
Add a simplification toggle that re-explains any solve step or research finding using analogies, simpler vocabulary, and concrete examples. Adjustable complexity levels (elementary, high school, undergraduate, expert).

**Rationale:** Complex explanations can overwhelm learners. Adaptive explanation complexity meets users at their current understanding level, reducing cognitive load and improving comprehension across skill levels.
